body_html: One last thing. Can you please add a test that uses this change? Just instantiate one of each kind of RNNs we have and pass a batch through it - once without passing the hidden state, and once with a manually constructed one. Then use self.assertEqual to compare them and make sure that it works as we want. Thanks!

body: One last thing. Can you please add a test that uses this change? Just instantiate one of each kind of RNNs we have and pass a batch through it - once without passing the hidden state, and once with a manually constructed one. Then use `self.assertEqual` to compare them and make sure that it works as we want. Thanks!
